body.name: Kirk's Castile Bar Soap Clean Soap for Men, Women & Children | Premium Coconut Oil | Sensitive Skin Formula, Vegan | Fragrance-Free/Unscented | 4 oz. Bars - 3 Pack
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

FREE pickup February 22 - 24 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: GENTLE CASTILE SOAP Kirk’s castile soap is both gentle on the skin – and the environment! Cleanse and soothe dry, irritated skin, and enjoy deep moisturizing with our antioxidant-rich coconut oil soap. Pack of three 4 oz. soap bars.

NATURAL FORMULA Kirk’s bar soap, made with 100% premium coconut oil, gently cleanses without using harsh toxins. Biodegradable and equally effective in soft and hard waters, such as well water. Kirk’s is great for the whole family!

VEGAN BAR SOAP Vegetable-based vegan bar soap creates a gentle & creamy lather, leaving skin feeling soft and healthy. Coconut oil helps remove dead skin cells and dirt away from the face and body. Naturally hydrating and moisturizing, Kirk’s soap gently cleanses without using harsh toxins or chemicals.

SENSITIVE SKIN FRIENDLY Kirk’s body soap is natural and safe for men and women, and children with sensitive skin. Free of Fragrance, Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates, EDTA, Colorants, Gluten and more; Kirk’s Gentle Castile Soap is great for the whole family! Available in Original Fresh Scent, Fragrance Free/Unscented, and Aloe Vera.

KIRK’S is the only coconut castile soap brand that has been continually made since 1839. We use natural ingredients for health-conscious families who want every-day, high-quality cleansing products – a natural clean you can feel great about; from head to toe and throughout your home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for so many things!
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap, I grated a bar up and mixed it with a few other things and it’s made a wonderful laundry detergent! It cleans my clothes really well!!! I put one of the bars in the bathroom and use it as a body wash and love it! Lathers nicely, not a strong smell, and has lasted me a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My current favorite body bar
reviews.reviewText: This bar is lathers really well and doesn't bother my skin. I have been on a quest to try and use more and more natural products so I really love that this seems to be mostly natural ingredients. The original scent scores a 3 on EWG, which is a good thing as 1 is the best and 10 is the worst (consider it danger levels). The unscented kinds scores a 1. The only reason for 3 instead of a one is that fragrance is considered an iffy ingredient. The soap is wrapped in easily recyclable paper, but sadly the multipack is in plastic. The plastic wrap is the main reason why I'm debating on a switch. It doesn't dry out my skin, seems to clean well, and smells pretty normal so nothing strong or anything (it you want a really scented soap you might want to look elsewhere). I personally like this soap. It's also a normal bar size so cheaper than some since it's not uncommon to see natural soap sell for a higher price than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kirks is so much better than other bar soaps
reviews.reviewText: This soap is wonderful. I use to use ivory for decades but increasingly I wasnt pleased. My skin felt dry. A friend gave me a bar of kirks. Yes I’m old. Your people don’t like bars, anything that produces foam/bulbs. That’s great but I don’t feel clean with liquid soap. So for people still using Bars I think you’ll find this a games changer. It produces bubbles. I feel clean and my skin feels comfortable, not dry. I’ve used it for years and I’m sold. Won’t be switching to anything else. Give it a try. You can get it online but brick and mortar stores carry it too (I get mine at Publix in Florida). If you are dissatisfied with your soap give this a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I buy this soap ALL THE TIME!
reviews.reviewText: This soap doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, so I’ve repurchased it numerous times. But I have trouble finding it locally so I always turn to Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I switched to this soap because they do not test on animals. That is so important! I like that it is unscented. It comes 3 bars in a package. I buy it mostly from my local supermarket, the price there is less than online. Good soap! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE PRICE POINT ON THIS PRODUCT KEEPS SHIFTING, SOMETIMES WHEN YOU HAVE IT IN THE CART!
reviews.reviewText: Some kind of annoying algorithm used by Amazon to be sure to charge you as much as they think they can get away with, but I digress. I find this soap to be gentle on my skin and make everything so, so soft. It's worth the extra money to get things clean or soft and prevents you from having to use products that are overburdened with chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent soap product for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Only problem from vendor was I ordered 2 3pks (6 total bars) and they shipped just 1 3 bar pkg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The lather is so soft, I want to say silky
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a bar of this soap to try making laundry soap. Before I could get around to doing that, I wound up using it in the shower. The lather from this bar is different than the Oil of Olay soap I've been using for lord-only-knows how long. The lather bubbles are much smaller and there are about a bazillion more of them packed together. It makes the lather SO SOFT and it goes all over without having to use tons of the bar. I was VERY pleased when I rinsed it off and my body felt all "squeaky clean" like the liquid castile soaps that I have used before. It makes me not want to use a washcloth so I can get the full effect. I don't feel a residue but I want to wash with it more because I love the feel of this lather. I like the clean smell of it and the natural look and feel of the bar. I found it in 3 packs at my grocer and it is now in regular rotation with the liquid tea tree soaps. I'm getting better at going more natural in my skin care products and this was a good choice for me. Knowing how soap is made helps too, it's basically lye mixed with fat and then cured. The fat here is coconut oil which is pretty much the best fat ever for everything from cooking to lotion or hair care. A reviewer said to unwrap and store the soap so it can cure more, that is correct. Really good soap gets better when it cures longer.
